query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nineBoxPositions) as total_9box,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM successionPlans) as total_planos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM successionCandidates) as total_candidatos
